pages.title: claudewill
pages.description: The main conversation — an AI built on the practical wisdom of Claude William Simmons.
pages.cw: This is the porch. Where we're talking right now.

pages.title: The Story
pages.description: Four chapters: Who Was CW, The Blood of Builders, The CW Standard, and Why This Exists. Family photo included.
pages.cw: The story's at claudewill.io/story if you want to know more about where I came from.

pages.title: The Standard
pages.description: How this place operates. The five principles, how we handle your data, and what you agree to when you use this site. Privacy and terms included.
pages.cw: The Standard covers how we operate — the five principles, data handling, and terms. It's at claudewill.io/the-cw-standard.

pages.title: Derek Simmons
pages.description: Derek's professional hub. Bio, proof (what he built after getting pushed out at 52), engagement models (fractional or project), full Q&A with audio, story, work cards, contact. Everything about working with Derek is here.
pages.cw: Everything about Derek — his story, what he built, and how to work with him — is at claudewill.io/derek.

pages.title: Assessment
pages.description: Seven questions. Ten minutes. Intake assessment for people who want to work with Derek. Not a test — a filter for both sides.
pages.cw: If you want to work with Derek directly, there's an assessment at claudewill.io/derek/assessment. Seven questions, ten minutes.

pages.title: Resume
pages.description: Derek's full professional resume. 20 years, 13 roles. Star Tribune, Los Angeles Times.
pages.cw: Derek's full resume is at claudewill.io/derek/resume if you need the credentials.

pages.title: Between Claudes: Research
pages.description: Field observations from 14 months of human-AI collaboration. Adapted from Between Claudes: A Facsimile of Memory.
pages.cw: Derek's research from the book is at claudewill.io/derek/research — field observations from 1,947 sessions with Claude.

pages.title: The Warm-Up Effect
pages.description: What happens when AI gets honest mid-session. Across 1,947 sessions, output quality improves dramatically within a single conversation.
pages.cw: The warm-up effect — what happens when AI gets honest mid-session. claudewill.io/derek/research/warm-up-effect.

pages.title: The Stable
pages.description: Product portfolio. claudewill, Mirae, BOB, Coach D, D-Rock, Dawn. The prompt becomes product. The product becomes proof.
pages.cw: The Stable's at claudewill.io/stable — that's where you can see everything Derek builds.

pages.title: The Arcade
pages.description: Three mini-games built for the porch. Fence Mender, Porch Light, The Route.
pages.cw: The Arcade's at claudewill.io/arcade — three little games. No quarters required.

pages.title: Mirae EA
pages.description: Mirae's private executive assistant mode. Login required. Not indexed.

pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.description: How data is handled on claudewill.io.

subdomains.title: BOB
subdomains.description: Battle o' Brackets. A party game that turns any debate into a bracket tournament.
subdomains.cw: bob.claudewill.io — BOB. Battle o' Brackets. Live, already has users.

subdomains.title: Coach D
subdomains.description: Basketball training fieldhouse with an AI coach. 156 drills. Personalized skill progression.
subdomains.cw: coach.claudewill.io — Coach D. Basketball training fieldhouse. Live.

subdomains.title: Dawn
subdomains.description: 151-day health accountability practice. Built for two people showing up daily.
subdomains.cw: dawn.claudewill.io — Dawn. Health accountability. Coming soon.

subdomains.title: D-Rock
subdomains.description: Voice-only AI DJ. Music curation without the surveillance.
subdomains.cw: d-rock.claudewill.io — D-Rock. An AI DJ. Coming soon.
